titleStmt.title: These are to give notice, that from the 25th of this instant June, the post will pass thrice a week betwixt England and Ireland, and in like manner betwixt Dublin and the several post-stages in the country
titleStmt.author: Warburton, George.

titleStmt.title: These are to give notice, that from the 25th of this instant June, the post will pass thrice a week betwixt England and Ireland, and in like manner betwixt Dublin and the several post-stages in the country
titleStmt.author: Warburton, George.

notesStmt.note: Title from first 5 lines of text.
Signed and dated: In Dublin this 15th of June. 1683. George Warburton.
This work appears on reels 1107:9 and 1319:14.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
